short_description: Build a naive bayes text classifier.
long_description: Build a naive bayes text classifier.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: The table defining the training tokens.
input_tables.description: The table defining the training tokens.

argument_clauses.name: TokenColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the token_table column that contains the tokens to be classified.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the token_table column that contains the tokens to be classified.

argument_clauses.name: DocCategoryColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the token_table column that contains the document category.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the token_table column that contains the document category.

argument_clauses.name: DocIdColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the token_table columns that contain the document identifier.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the token_table columns that contain the document identifier.

argument_clauses.name: CategoryColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the categories_table column that contains the prediction categories. The default value is the first column of categories_table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the categories_table column that contains the prediction categories. The default value is the first column of categories_table.

argument_clauses.name: StopwordsColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the stop_words_table column that contains the stop words. The default value is the first column of stop_words_table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the stop_words_table column that contains the stop words. The default value is the first column of stop_words_table.

argument_clauses.name: ModelType
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the model type of the text classifier. The default value is 'Multinomial'. The formulas for the two model types follow this table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the model type of the text classifier. The default value is 'Multinomial'. The formulas for the two model types follow this table.

argument_clauses.name: Categories
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the prediction categories. Note: Specify either this argument or the categories_table, but not both.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the prediction categories. Note: Specify either this argument or the categories_table, but not both.

argument_clauses.name: Stopwords
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies words to ignore (such as a, an, and the). Note: Specify either this argument or the stop_words_table, but not both.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies words to ignore (such as a, an, and the). Note: Specify either this argument or the stop_words_table, but not both.
